languages.text: Активное вмешательство в вечный сон мертвого города разгневало усопших — по крайней мере, так сейчас говорят ваши выжившие разведчики. В какой-то момент, прямо посреди очередной экспедиции, по стеклянному куполу пошла трещина. Разведчики бросились искать укрытие, однако купол успел расколоться прежде, и палящие лучи местного солнца, наконец пробившиеся сквозь защитный барьер, за считанные секунды испепелили и мертвый город, и ваших людей.

traits.locale_text: Активное вмешательство в вечный сон мертвого города разгневало усопших — по крайней мере, так сейчас говорят ваши выжившие разведчики. В какой-то момент, прямо посреди очередной экспедиции, по стеклянному куполу пошла трещина. Разведчики бросились искать укрытие, однако купол успел расколоться прежде, и палящие лучи местного солнца, наконец пробившиеся сквозь защитный барьер, за считанные секунды испепелили и мертвый город, и ваших людей.

languages.text: Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what the surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.
languages.original_text: Активное вмешательство в вечный сон мертвого города разгневало усопших — по крайней мере, так сейчас говорят ваши выжившие разведчики. В какой-то момент, прямо посреди очередной экспедиции, по стеклянному куполу пошла трещина. Разведчики бросились искать укрытие, однако купол успел расколоться прежде, и палящие лучи местного солнца, наконец пробившиеся сквозь защитный барьер, за считанные секунды испепелили и мертвый город, и ваших людей.

traits.locale_text: Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what your surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could find any. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could find any. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what the surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

languages.text: 扰乱这座城市的安眠肯定是激怒了那些早已逝世的居民，至少幸存的探险者都是这么说的。在这次例行的探索中，玻璃穹顶的某处突然出现了裂缝。探索队员奋力跑向避难所，但他们还没来得及躲起来，穹顶就碎了。失去了玻璃屏障的保护之后，当地恒星的灼热光线在几秒钟内，就把整个定居点和你的人烧成了灰。
languages.original_text: Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what the surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

traits.locale_text: 扰乱这座城市的安眠肯定是激怒了那些早已逝世的居民，至少幸存的探险者都是这么说的。在这次例行的探索中，玻璃穹顶的某处突然出现了裂缝。探索队员奋力跑向避难所，但他们还没来得及躲起来，穹顶就碎了。失去了玻璃屏障的保护之后，当地恒星的灼热光线在几秒钟内，就把整个定居点和你的人烧成了灰。

languages.text: 街の眠りを妨げることは、長い間眠りについていた住民を怒らせたに違いない。少なくとも、現在生き残っている探検家たちはそう言っている。ある時、定期遠征中にガラスドームに亀裂が入った。偵察隊たちはシェルターに向かって走ったが、逃げきる前にドームは粉々に砕け散った。防護壁からの保護を失った集落と部下たちは、わずか数秒で灼熱の太陽に焼き尽くされてしまった。
languages.original_text: Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what the surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

traits.locale_text: 街の眠りを妨げることは、長い間眠りについていた住民を怒らせたに違いない。少なくとも、現在生き残っている探検家たちはそう言っている。ある時、定期遠征中にガラスドームに亀裂が入った。偵察隊たちはシェルターに向かって走ったが、逃げきる前にドームは粉々に砕け散った。防護壁からの保護を失った集落と部下たちは、わずか数秒で灼熱の太陽に焼き尽くされてしまった。

languages.text: Perturbar el descanso de la ciudad ha debido de enfurecer a sus habitantes muertos, o eso afirman los exploradores que quedan. En algún momento, durante una expedición rutinaria una grieta se ha abierto en la cúpula de cristal. Los exploradores han corrido para buscar refugio, pero la cúpula se ha hecho añicos antes de que pudieran escapar. Los abrasadores rayos de sol, al no estar la barrera protectora en su camino, han incinerado el asentamiento y a tus hombres en cuestión de segundos.
languages.original_text: Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what the surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

traits.locale_text: Perturbar el descanso de la ciudad ha debido de enfurecer a sus habitantes muertos, o eso afirman los exploradores que quedan. En algún momento, durante una expedición rutinaria una grieta se ha abierto en la cúpula de cristal. Los exploradores han corrido para buscar refugio, pero la cúpula se ha hecho añicos antes de que pudieran escapar. Los abrasadores rayos de sol, al no estar la barrera protectora en su camino, han incinerado el asentamiento y a tus hombres en cuestión de segundos.

languages.text: Die längst verstorbenen Bewohner der Stadt waren wohl erzürnt, weil ihr Schlaf gestört wurde. Zumindest sagen das die überlebenden Kundschafter jetzt. Während einer Routineexpedition erschien plötzlich ein Riss in der Glaskuppel. Die Kundschafter rannten los, um sich in Sicherheit zu bringen, doch die Kuppel zersprang, bevor sie entkommen konnten. Die gleißenden Strahlen der örtlichen Sonne wurden nicht länger von der Schutzbarriere zurückgehalten und äscherten die Siedlung und deine Männer innerhalb von Sekunden ein.
languages.original_text: Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what the surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

traits.locale_text: Die längst verstorbenen Bewohner der Stadt waren wohl erzürnt, weil ihr Schlaf gestört wurde. Zumindest sagen das die überlebenden Kundschafter jetzt. Während einer Routineexpedition erschien plötzlich ein Riss in der Glaskuppel. Die Kundschafter rannten los, um sich in Sicherheit zu bringen, doch die Kuppel zersprang, bevor sie entkommen konnten. Die gleißenden Strahlen der örtlichen Sonne wurden nicht länger von der Schutzbarriere zurückgehalten und äscherten die Siedlung und deine Männer innerhalb von Sekunden ein.

languages.text: En troublant le sommeil de la ville, vous avez dû contrarier ses défunts habitants, ou du moins est-ce ce que les explorateurs rescapés laissent entendre. Une fissure est apparue dans le dôme de verre au cours d'une expédition de routine. Les éclaireurs ont aussitôt cherché un abri, mais la structure a cédé sans leur laisser le temps de s'échapper. La barrière protectrice levée, les rayons brûlants du soleil local ont incinéré la colonie en l'espace de quelques secondes, et vos hommes avec.
languages.original_text: Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what the surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.

Une fissure est apparue dans le dôme de verre au cours d'une expédition de routine. Les éclaireurs ont aussitôt cherché un abri, mais la structure a cédé sans leur laisser le temps de s'échapper. La barrière protectrice levée, les rayons brûlants du soleil local ont incinéré la colonie en l'espace de quelques secondes, et vos hommes avec.

languages.text: Şehrin huzurunu bozunca uzun zaman evvel ölmüş sakinleri de kızmış olmalı... En azından kâşiflerden sağ kalanlar artık böyle diyor. Rutin bir keşif sırasında bir noktada cam kubbede bir çatlak oluşmuş. Keşif erleri sığınmak için koşsa da onlar kaçamadan kubbe parçalanmış. Artık koruyucu bir bariyer olmadığı için kavurucu güneş ışınları hem yerleşim yerini hem de adamlarını saniyeler içinde yakıp kül etmiş.
languages.original_text: Disturbing the city's slumber must have angered its long-dead inhabitants— at least, this is what the surviving explorers are now saying. At some point a crack appeared in the glass dome during a routine expedition. The scouts ran for shelter, but the dome shattered before they could escape. No longer held back by the protective barrier, the scorching rays of the local sun incinerated the settlement and your men within seconds.
